Which build?
Do you have the complete log?
What actions were you doing at the time?

Build: GM4.
The only other thing in the log was the startup details:

!SESSION Jun 26, 2002 11:33:34.983 ---------------------------------------------
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.3.1 IBM build cxia32131-20020410 (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_GB
Command-line arguments: -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -data
/home/adsouza/workspace -install file:/opt/eclipse/eclipse/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui 4 0 Jun 26, 2002 11:33:34.986
!MESSAGE Internal error
!STACK 0

I cannot remember exactly what I was doing at the time, unfortunately :-(
This code is not thread-safe.  I will investigate.

Released a fix.  It was not thread safe because it accessed the resource info 
for each resource twice (once to count the team-private members, then again to 
copy into the new array).  During this period resources can be added, deleted, 
or change their team-private status.  The fix was to just null array entries on 
the first pass, then collect all non-null entries into a new array at the end.
